sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The dignitie of preaching in a sermon vpon 1. Thessal. 5.20. By Sam. Hieron. Hieron, Samuel, 1576?-1617.
[6], 23, [3] p.
Printed by Felix Kyngston for VVilliam Welby, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Swanne in Pauls Church-yard, At London : 1615.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-D⁴. The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A". Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
The dignitie of preaching in a sermon vpon 1. Thessal. 5.20. By Sam. Hieron. Hieron, Samuel, 1576?-1617.
[6], 23, [3] p.
Printed by Felix Kyngston for VVilliam Welby, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Swanne in Pauls Church-yard, At London : 1615.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-D⁴. The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A". Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
VVilliam Welby
Felix Kyngston
his shop at the signe of the Swanne in Pauls Church-yard
